萔字的基本解释

萔
tiáo
古同“苕”。

萔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiáo］
［《廣韻》徒聊切，平蕭，定。］
亦作“芀1”。亦作“萔1”。
(1)陵苕。亦名凌霄、紫葳。蔓生草。
(2)苕饶。豆类植物。
(3)字本作“芀”。芦苇的花。苕秆可为帚。
(4)水名。
(5)见“苕苕”。
[②]［sháo］
亦作“萔2”。
方言。红苕。即红薯。

萔字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萔； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1041第34
【韻學集成】同苕。

萔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
萔字的起名意思

暂无。

Lin
Basic explanation of words
Lin
tiáo
Ancient with "Vax".
Lin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiáo］
["Guangyun" only chats and cuts, Pingxiao, Ding. ]
Also known as "Qian 1". Also known as "萔1".
(1) Ling Tao. Also known as Lingxiao and Bignonia. Creeping grass.
(2) Shao Rao. Legumes.
(3) The script is "Qian". The flower of the reed. Vetch stalks can be brooms.
(4) Water name.
(5) See "Vax vetch".
[②]［sháo］
Also known as "萔2".
dialect. Sweet potato. Namely sweet potatoes.
Lin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　萔; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1041 Page 34
【Integration of rhyme】the same as the vetch.
